text: The optimizer generates a mapping of a logical algebra expression to the optimal equivalent physical algebra expression. Physical operators define a specific execution strategy using an access path. » They can depend on the physical format of the data that they process (i.e., sorting, compression). » Not always a 1:1 mapping from logical to physical. ££CMU-DB ) | - - ‘ ‘ - |4 > >l o) — 15:47 / 1:02:54 - Logical vs Physical Plans > m *— g D :] 14 - Query Planning & Optimization | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
